article_title: Netanyahu and Biden spar over Israel-Gaza war support
sentence: Israel  launched  a  large-scale  air  and  ground  offensive  in  Gaza  after  Hamas  gunmen  killed  about  1,200  people  in  southern  Israel  and  took  253  hostages,  some  of  whom  have  since  been  released.

article_title: Netanyahu and Biden spar over Israel-Gaza war support
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  the  Gaza  Strip  says  at  least  29,878  people  have  been  killed  in  the  territory  since  then  -  including  96  deaths  in  the  past  24  hours  -  in  addition  to  70,215  who  have  been  wounded.
